qas.question: What organization operates the Delhi Metro system?
The Delhi Metro Rail Corporation operates under the administrative control of what government body?
The Delhi Metro project was spearheaded by what Indian government figure?
Padma Vibhushan E. Sreedharan was popularly known by what nickname?
What major award was given to Padma Vibhushan E. Sreedharan for his contribution the the Delhi Metro?

context: Delhi Metro is being built and operated by the <a0_0>Delhi Metro Rail Corporation<a0_0/> Limited (DMRC), a state-owned company with equal equity participation from Government of India and Government of National Capital Territory of Delhi. However, the organisation is under administrative control of <a1_0>Ministry of Urban Development<a1_0/>, Government of India. Besides construction and operation of Delhi metro, DMRC is also involved in the planning and implementation of metro rail, monorail and high-speed rail projects in India and providing consultancy services to other metro projects in the country as well as abroad. The Delhi Metro project was spearheaded by <a2_0>Padma Vibhushan E. Sreedharan<a2_0/>, the Managing Director of DMRC and popularly known as the <a3_0>"Metro Man"<a3_0/> of India. He famously resigned from DMRC, taking moral responsibility for a metro bridge collapse which took five lives. Sreedharan was awarded with the prestigious <a4_0>Legion of Honour<a4_0/> by the French Government for his contribution to Delhi Metro.
